document.topic_text: Warrant issued in connection with Blair Park Drive shooting By: News 10 Posted: Mon 2:45 PM, Apr 25, 2016 By: News 10 / Headlines List / Article A three count felony warrant has been issued for Deondre Depree Hardman, who is 20 years old. The warrant is in connection wit the shooting of 27-year-old Dontae Jackson which occurred on Friday, April 22, 2016 at 7:00 p.m. The three counts are: - Assault with intent to murder- Felon in possession of a firearm- Felony firearm The Jackson Police Department is asking for assistance in location Hardman. Anyone with information on his whereabouts should contact Detective Stiles at (517) 206-1119, or anonymously at Crime Stoppers of Mid-Michigan at (855) 840-7867 Michigan Health chief: Legionnaires' didn't rise much to his level WILX.com is happy to provide a forum for commenting and discussion.
